mapper.update: update report set delete_whether = 'y' where original_code = #{original_code}
mapper.select: select report_code from report where member_id=#{member_id} and original_code=#{original_code}

select REPORT_DATE, REPORT_TITLE, DELETE_WHETHER, MEMBER_ID, REPORT_CLASSIFICATION, REPORT_CODE, to_char(REPORT_CONTENT) as report_content, count(*) over(partition by original_code) as report_count ,ORIGINAL_CODE from report GROUP BY ORIGINAL_CODE,DELETE_WHETHER, MEMBER_ID, REPORT_CLASSIFICATION, REPORT_CODE, to_char(REPORT_CONTENT), REPORT_DATE, REPORT_TITLE order by delete_whether asc

select REPORT_DATE, REPORT_TITLE, DELETE_WHETHER, MEMBER_ID, REPORT_CLASSIFICATION, REPORT_CODE, to_char(REPORT_CONTENT) as report_content, count(*) over(partition by original_code) as report_count ,ORIGINAL_CODE from report where report_code = #{report_code} GROUP BY ORIGINAL_CODE,DELETE_WHETHER, MEMBER_ID, REPORT_CLASSIFICATION, REPORT_CODE, to_char(REPORT_CONTENT), REPORT_DATE, REPORT_TITLE, ORIGINAL_CODE order by delete_whether asc
